1.verse: UPawulos, umpostile kaYesu Kristu ngokuthanda kukaThixo,  ubhalela abangcwele abase-Efese, abakholwayo kuKristu Yesu;

2.verse: athi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.

3.verse: Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, lowo wasisikelelayo ngeentsikelelo zonke zoMoya kwezasemazulwini iindawo, sikuKristu;

4.verse: njengokuba wathi, ngaphambi kokusekwa kwehlabathi,  wasinyulela kuye, ukuba sibe ngcwele, singabi nasiphako phambi kwakhe;

5.verse: othe ngokusithanda wasimisela ngenxa engaphambili, ukuba senziwe oonyana kuye ngokwakhe ngoYesu Kristu, ngokwenkolelo yokuthanda kwakhe,

6.verse: ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lobabalo lwakhe, awasibabala ngalo sikuye Othandiweyo;

7.verse: esinayo sikuye inkululeko ngokuhlawulelwa ngegazi lakhe,  ukuxolelwa ke kweziphoso zethu, ngokobutyebi bobabalo lwakhe;

8.verse: awaluphuphumisela kuthi, lunabo bonke ubulumko nokuqonda;

9.verse: esazisile imfihlelo yokuthanda kwakhe ngokwenkolelo yakhe,  awayimisayo ngokwakhe,

10.verse: ebhekise ekuhleleni aya kuhlela ngako, akuzaliseka amaxesha, ukuba azihlanganisele zonke izinto kuye uKristu,  ezisemazulwini kwanezisemhlabeni;

11.verse: ewe, kuye lo sithe sikuye sadla ilifa; simisiwe ngenxa engaphambili ngokwengqibo yozisebenzayo zonke ezo nto ngokwecebo lokuthanda kwakhe;

12.verse: ukuze sibe ngabokudumisa uzuko lwakhe, thina aba sathi ngenxa engaphambili sathembela kuye uKristu;

13.verse: enithe, nikuye nani, nakuliva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezi zilungileyo zokusindiswa kwenu-enithe, nakukholwa nokukholwa kuye, natywinwa naqiniselwa ngaye uMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga,

14.verse: osisinyaniso selifa lethu, ukude kugqibelele ukukhululeka ngentlawulelo kwabo baziinqobo kuye, ukuba kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe.

15.verse: Ngenxa yoko nam, ndakuba ndikuvile okwenu ukukholwa yiNkosi uYesu, nokubathanda kwenu bonke abangcwele,

16.verse: andiphezi ukubulela ngenxa yenu, ndinikhumbula emithandazweni yam,

17.verse: ukuba uThixo weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, uYise wozuko,  aninike umoya wobulumko wokunityhilela, nimazi kakuhle;

18.verse: nikhanyiselwe amehlo engqondo, ukuze nilazi into eliyiyo ithemba lobizo lwakhe, nento obuyiyo ubutyebi bobuqaqawuli belifa lakhe phakathi kwabo abangcwele;

19.verse: nento obuyiyo ubukhulu obuncamisileyo bamandla akhe abhekisele kuthi, thina bakholwayo, angokokusebenza kokuqinisela kokomelela kwakhe,

20.verse: awakusebenza kuye uKristu, ekumvuseni kwakhe kwabafileyo;  waza wamhlalisa ngasekunene kwakhe kwezasemazulwini iindawo,

21.verse: ngaphezu kwalo lonke ulawulo, negunya, namandla, nobukhosi,  nalo lonke igama elikhankanywayo, kungekhona kweli phakade lodwa, kunakwelo lizayo.

22.verse: Waza izinto zonke wazithobela phantsi kweenyawo zakhe,  wammisa ukuba abe yintloko phezu kweento zonke kulo ibandla,

23.verse: lona lingumzimba wakhe, ukuzala ke oko kozizalisayo izinto zonke ngako konke.

1.verse: Nani unidlise ubomi, nifile nje ziziphoso na zizono;

2.verse: enanifudula nihamba kuzo ngokwesimo seli hlabathi,  ngokomphathi wegunya lesibhakabhaka, womoya lo usebenzayo ngoku kubo abangevayo;

3.verse: esasifudula nathi sonke sihleli phakathi kwabo ezinkanukweni zenyama yethu, sisenza ukuthanda kwenyama nokwengcinga, saye ngemvelo sikwangabantwana bengqumbo, njengabanye abo.

4.verse: Ke uThixo, esisityebi nje ngenceba, uthe ngenxa yothando lwakhe olukhulu, awasithanda ngalo,

5.verse: thina sifile nje ziziphoso, wasidlisa ubomi ndawonye noKristu (nisindiswe ngokubabalwa),

6.verse: wasivusa naye, wasihlalisa naye kwezasemazulwini iindawo,  sikuKristu Yesu;

7.verse: ukuze ubutyebi obuncamisileyo bobabalo lwakhe abubonakalalise emaphakadeni azayo, ngokusenzela ububele ngoKristu Yesu.

8.verse: Kuba nisindiswe ngokubabalwa nangalo ukholo; nako oko kungaphumi kuni, kusisipho sikaThixo;

9.verse: akuphumi misebenzini, hleze kubekho bani uqhayisayo.

10.verse: Kuba thina singumsebenzi wakhe, sidalelwe kuKristu Yesu,  ukuze senze imisebenzi elungileyo, awayilungisayo uThixo ngenxa engaphambili, ukuze sihambe kuyo.

11.verse: Ngoko ndithi, Khumbulani ukuba nina, enibe nifudule niziintlanga ngokwenyama, kusithiwa ningabangalukileyo, ngabo kuthiwa ngabolwaluko olwenziwe ngezandla enyameni:

12.verse: okokuba ngelo xesha nibe ningenaKristu, ningazani nawo umzi wakwaSirayeli, ningabasemzini kuyo iminqophiso yalo idinga,  ningenathemba, ningenaThixo ehlabathini.

13.verse: Ke ngoku ngoKristu Yesu, nina, enibe nifudula nikude, nithe naba kufuphi ngalo igazi likaKristu.

14.verse: Kuba nguye oluxolo lwethu, yena uthe izinto zombini wazenza zaba nye, waluchitha ke udonga lothango oluphakathi, ubumpi ke obo,

15.verse: akuba ewubhangisile, esenyameni yakhe, umyalelo wemithetho esemimiselweni; ukuze abo babini abadalele kuye ngokwakhe, babe mntu mnye, mtsha, esenza ke uxolo;

16.verse: nokuze abaxolelanise noThixo abo babini, babe mzimba mnye ngawo umnqamlezo, ebubulalele kuwo ubumpi obo.

17.verse: Weza ke washumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zoxolo kuni abo bakude, nakwabakufuphi;

18.verse: ngokuba kungaye ukungeniswa kwethu sobabini, siMoya mnye kuye uYise.

19.verse: Ngoko ke anisengabasemzini nabaphambukeli; ningamakhaya kubo abangcwele, ningabendlu kaThixo,

20.verse: nakhelwe phezu kwelitye lesiseko sabapostile nabaprofeti,  inguYesu Kristu ngokwakhe ilitye lembombo;

21.verse: esithi kuye sonke isakhiwo, sihlangene kakuhle, sikhule,  sibe yitempile engcwele eNkosini;

22.verse: enithi nani nakhelwe ndawonye kuye, ukuze nibe yindawo yokuhlala kaThixo ngaye uMoya.

1.verse: Ngenxa yoko, mna Pawulos, mbanjwa kaKristu Yesu ngenxa yenu zintlanga

2.verse: ukuba ke nikuvile ukugosisa kobabalo lukaThixo endanibabalelwa ngalo;

3.verse: okokuba wandazisa imfihlelo leyo ngokotyhilelo, njengoko sendibhale kade ngokufutshane;

4.verse: enothi ngoko, nakulesa, nibe nokuqiqa okwam ukuyiqonda imfihlelo kaKristu;

5.verse: ababengathanga kuzimbi izizukulwana bayaziswe oonyana babantu, njengoko bayityhilelweyo ngoku abapostile bakhe abangcwele, nabaprofeti bakhe, ngaye uMoya;

6.verse: eyokuba iintlanga ziziindlalifa nathi, zikwamzimba mnye nathi, zingamahlulelana nathi ngedinga lakhe, sikuye nje uKristu ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo,

7.verse: endaba ngumlungiseleli wazo ngokwesipho sobabalo lukaThixo,  endababalwa ngaso ngokokusebenza kwamandla akhe.

8.verse: Mna lo, unguyena mncinanana kubo bonke abangcwele,  ndababalwa ngolo lubabalo, lokuba ndishumayele phakathi kweentlanga iindaba ezilungileyo zobutyebi obungalandekiyo bukaKristu;

9.verse: ndibakhanyisele bonke, bayibone into obuyiyo ubudlelane bemfihlelo ebifihliwe kwasemaphakadeni, ikuye uThixo owazidalayo zonke izinto ngoYesu Kristu;

10.verse: ukuze ngoku oozilawuli noomagunya, abakwezasemazulwini iindawo, babaziswe ngalo ibandla ubulumko bukaThixo,  obuziintlobo ezininzi,

11.verse: ngokokwengqibo yakhe yasemaphakadeni, awayenzayo kuKristu Yesu, iNkosi yethu;

12.verse: esinako sikuye ukungafihlisi kwethu, nokungeniswa kuye sikholosile, ngokukholwa kuye.

13.verse: Kungoko ndicelayo ukuba ningethi amandla ziimbandezelo zam,  ezingenxa yenu, zona ezi ziluzuko lwenu.

14.verse: Ngenxa yoko ndiyawagoba amadolo am kuye uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu,

15.verse: ebizwe ngaye yonke imizalwane esemazulwini nesemhlabeni,

16.verse: ukuba aninike, ngokobutyebi bozuko lwakhe, ukomelezwa ngamandla ngaye uMoya wakhe, ngokusingisele emntwini ongaphakathi;

17.verse: ukuba uKristu ahlale ngalo ukholo ezintliziyweni zenu,  nendele nisekelwe eluthandweni,

18.verse: ukuze nithi, ndawonye nabo bonke abangcwele, nibe nako kanye ukubuqiqa into obuyiyo ububanzi, nobude, nobunzulu,  nokuphakama kwalo,

19.verse: kwanokulwazi uthando lukaKristu oluncamise ukwazi; ukuze niye nizala ngako konke ukuzala kukaThixo.

20.verse: Kuye ke onako ukwenza okungaphezu kweento zonke ngokugqithiseleyo kakhulu, ngaphezu kwesikucelayo nesinokukuqiqa, ngokokwamandla asebenzayo ngaphakathi kwethu,

21.verse: kuye malubekho uzuko ebandleni elikuKristu Yesu, kuse kuzo zonke izizukulwana zalo iphakade lasemaphakadeni. Amen.

1.verse: Ndiyanivuselela ngoko, mna mbanjwa waseNkosini, ukuba nihambe ngokulufaneleyo ubizo enabizwa ngalo,

2.verse: ninako konke ukuthobeka kwentliziyo nobulali, ninokuzeka kade umsindo, ninyamezelana, nisenziwa luthando,

3.verse: nikhuthalele ukubugcina ubunye boMoya ngentambo yoxolo.

4.verse: Mnye umzimba, mnye noMoya, njengokuba nabizwayo nokubizwa,  naba nathemba linye lobizo lwenu.

5.verse: Inye iNkosi, lunye ukholo, lunye ubhaptizo,

6.verse: mnye uThixo, uYise wabo bonke, ophezu kwabo bonke, okubo bonke, ophakathi kwenu nonke.

7.verse: Ke elowo kuthi wababalwa ngokomlinganiso wokupha kukaKristu.

8.verse: Kungoko athi, Enyuke waya enyangweni, wathimba intimbo,  Wabapha izipho abantu.

9.verse: Oko ke kuthi, wenyuka, kuyintoni na, kungekwakukuthi, wehla nokuhla kuqala, waya kwezona ziseza ntsi iindawo zomhlaba?

10.verse: Owehlayo ikwangulowo wenyukayo, waya ngaphezu kwawo onke amazulu, ukuze azalise zonke izinto.

11.verse: Waza kwayena wabapha abanye ukuba babe ngabapostile, abanye babe ngabaprofeti, abanye babe ngabashumayeli beendaba ezilungileyo, abanye babe ngabalusi nabafundisi,

12.verse: ukuze abangcwele basulungekiselwe umsebenzi wolungiselelo,  ukwakhiwa ke komzimba kaKristu;

13.verse: side thina sonke sifike kubo ubunye benkolo, nobokumazi okuzeleyo uNyana kaThixo, ebudodeni obupheleleyo,  emlinganisweni wobukhulu bokuzala kukaKristu;

14.verse: ukuze singabi saba ziintsana, silatyuzwa, siphetshethwa ngumoya wonke wemfundiso, ngokunyanga kwabantu, ngobuqhetseba obusemaqhingeni olahlekiso;

15.verse: sithi ke, sinyanisekile eluthandweni, sikhulele, ngeendawo zonke, kuye lo uyintloko, uKristu;

16.verse: ekuphuma kuye ukuthi, umzimba wonke uhlangane kakuhle,  ubandakanywe ngako konke ukuxhomekelelana kwamalungu okuluncedo, okusebenza ngomlinganiso weendawo zonke ngazinye,  ukhulise umzimba, use ekuzakheni ngothando.

17.verse: Ke ngoko, oku ndiyakuthetha ndikungqine ndiseNkosini,  ukuthi, maningabi sahamba njengoko zihamba ngako nezinye iintlanga, ngamampunge engqiqo yazo,

18.verse: zenziwe mnyama iingqondo, zingazani nobomi bukaThixo ngenxa yokungazi okukuzo, ngenxa yokuqaqadeka kwentliziyo yazo;

19.verse: abathe bona, bengasaziva, bazinikela eburheletyweni, ukuze basebenze ukungcola konke, bebawa.

21.verse: ukuba kambe ningaba nimvile, nafundiswa nikuye, njengoko inyaniso ikuye uYesu;

22.verse: yokuba nithi ngakwihambo yangaphambili nimlahle umntu omdala, owonakaliswayo ngokokweenkanuko zokulukuhla;

23.verse: nihlaziywe ke kuwo umoya wengqiqo yenu,

24.verse: nimambathe umntu omtsha, othe ngokukaThixo wadalelwa ebulungiseni, nasebungcweleni benyaniso.

25.verse: Kungoko ke ndithi, lahlani ubuxoki, thethani inyaniso elowo nommelwane wakhe; ngokuba singamalungu, omnye elelomnye.

26.verse: Qumbani, ningoni; ilanga malingade litshone nicaphukile;

27.verse: kananjalo musani ukumkhwelela indawo uMtyholi lo.

28.verse: Lowo ubayo makangabi seba; kanye ke makabulaleke esebenza okulungileyo ngezandla zakhe, ukuze abe nako ukwabela osweleyo.

29.verse: Makungaphumi nanye intetho ebolileyo emlonyeni wenu; mayibe yesukuba ilungele ukuxuma oko kuluncedo, ukuze ibabale abevayo.

30.verse: Kanjalo musani ukumenza buhlungu uMoya oyiNgcwele kaThixo,  enathi kuye natywinwa, naqiniselelwa imini yentlawulelo.

31.verse: Mabukhweleliswe kuni bonke ubukrakra, nomsindo, nengqumbo,  nengcolo, nonyeliso, ndawonye nolunya lonke.

32.verse: Ke nina yibani nobubele omnye komnye, nibe nemfesane kakhulu, nixolelane, njengokuba naye uThixo wanixolelayo ekuKristu.

1.verse: Ngoko yibani ngabaxelisa uThixo, ngokwabantwana abaziintanda;

2.verse: nihambe eluthandweni, kwanjengokuba naye uKristu wasithandayo, wazinikela ngenxa yethu, ukuba abe ngumnikelo nedini kuye uThixo, ukuba abe livumba elimnandi.

3.verse: Ke umbulo, nako konke ukungcola, nokubawa, makungakhe kukhankanywe phakathi kwenu, njengoko kubafaneleyo abangcwele;

4.verse: kwanamanyala, nentetho yobuyatha, nobuhiba, izinto ezo ezingafanelekileyo. Makube kokukhona ninemibulelo.

5.verse: Kuba oku nikwazi, ukuba wonke umenzi wombulo, nomntu ongcolileyo, nolibawa, engumkhonzi wezithixo, akanalifa ebukumkanini bukaKristu noThixo.

6.verse: Makungabikho namnye unilukuhlayo ngamazwi alambathayo; kuba iza ngenxa yezo zinto ingqumbo kaThixo phezu kwabangevayo.

8.verse: Kuba nina naye nifudula nibubumnyama, ke ngoku nikukukhanya,  niseNkosini nje; hambani ke ngokwabantwana bokukhanya.

9.verse: Kuba sona isiqhamo soMoya sikuko konke ukulunga,  nobulungisa, nenyaniso;

10.verse: nicikida ukuba yintoni na ekholekileyo kakuhle kwiNkosi.

11.verse: Kanjalo musani ukuba nabudlelane ngemisebenzi yobumnyama engenasiqhamo; makube kukhona niyohlwayayo.

12.verse: Kuba izinto ezenziwa ngabo emfihlekweni kulihlazo nokuzithetha.

13.verse: Ke zonke ezi zinto, zakohlwaywa, ziyabonakalaliswa kukukhanya; kuba konke okubonakalaliswayo kukukhanya.

14.verse: Kungoko athi, Vuka wena uleleyo, uvuke kwabafileyo; uKristu wokukhanyisela.

15.verse: Khangelani ngoko, ukuba ningathini na, ukuze kucokiseke ukuhamba kwenu; ningabi njengabaswele ubulumko, yibani njengezilumko;

16.verse: nizongela ixesha eli, ngokuba le mihla ayindawo.

17.verse: Ngenxa yoko musani ukuba ziintsweli-kuqonda; yibani ngabakuqondayo into okuyiyo ukuthanda kweNkosi.

18.verse: Kanjalo musani ukunxila yiwayini, ekukhoyo kuloo nto ukuzibhubhisa; manizaliswe nguMoya;

19.verse: nithetha omnye nomnye ngeendumiso, neengoma, nezango ezizezomoya, nivuma, nibetha uhadi entliziyweni yenu kuyo iNkosi,

20.verse: nimana nibulela ngenxa yeento zonke, egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, kuye uThixo uYise;

22.verse: Nina bafazi, walulameleni awenu amadoda, ngokokululamela iNkosi;

23.verse: ngokuba indoda le iyintloko yomfazi, njengokuba naye uKristu eyintloko yebandla, eli; waye yena ngokwakhe enguMsindisi wawo umzimba.

24.verse: Ke, kwanjengokuba ibandla eli limlulamela uKristu, mabathi ngokunjalo nabafazi bawalulamele awabo amadoda ezintweni zonke.

25.verse: Nina madoda, bathandeni abafazi benu, njengokuba naye uKristu walithandayo ibandla, wazinikela ngenxa yalo;

26.verse: ukuze alingcwalise, elihlambulule ngokuhlamba kwamanzi ngelizwi;

27.verse: ukuze alimise phambi kwakhe linobuqaqawuli, lilibandla elingenabala, elingenamibimbi nanye into enjalo, ukuze libe ngcwele, lingabi nasiphako.

28.verse: Ngoko amelwe amadoda ukubathanda abawo abafazi, njengokuba beyimizimba yawo. Lowo umthandayo umkakhe, uyazithanda;

29.verse: kuba akukho namnye wakha wayithiya eyakhe inyama; usuka ayondle, ayigcine, njengokuba nayo iNkosi ilenjenjalo ibandla.

30.verse: Ngokuba singamalungu omzimba wayo, singabenyama yayo,  singabamathambo ayo.

31.verse: Ngenxa yoko ke, umntu womshiya uyise nonina, anamathele kuye umkakhe, baze abo babini babe nyama-nye.

32.verse: Loo mfihlelo inkulu; ke mna ndithetha ndisingisele kuKristu, ndisingisele nakulo ibandla.

33.verse: Kodwa ke manithi nani ngabanye, elowo amthande umkakhe,  njengoko azithanda ngako; umfazi ke makayoyike indoda.

1.verse: Nina bantwana, baveni abazali benu ngokwabaseNkosini; kuba oko kububulungisa.

2.verse: Beka uyihlo nonyoko; wona lowo ngumthetho wokuqala onedinga;

3.verse: ukuze kulunge kuwe, ube nexesha elide emhlabeni.

4.verse: Nani boyise, musani ukubacaphukisa abantwana benu;  bondleleni ekuqeqesheni nasekululekeni kweNkosi.

5.verse: Nina bakhonzi, baveni abaziinkosi zenu ngokwenyama,  ninokuzoyikela nokugubha, ningenakumbi ezintliziyweni zenu,  ninge niva uKristu ngokwakhe.

6.verse: Ukukhonza kwenu makungabi ngokweliso, ngathi nithomalalisa abantu; makube ngokwabakhonzi bakaKristu, nikwenza ukuthanda kukaThixo ngokwasemphefumlweni,

7.verse: nikhonza ngentumekelelo, kukuyo iNkosi, kungekubo abantu;

8.verse: nisazi nje ukuba into esukuba ilungile, athe ulowo wayenza,  uya kwamkeliswa kwayona yiNkosi, nokuba uNonzi nokuba ungokhululekileyo.

9.verse: Nani baziinkosi zabo, yenzani kwaezo zinto kubo, nikuyeke ukusongela; nisazi nje ukuba kwaeyabo neyenu iNkosi isemazulwini, nokuba akukho kukhetha buso kuyo.

10.verse: Elokugqiba, bazalwana bam, ndithi, Yomelelani eNkosini,  nasekuqineni kokomelela kwayo.

11.verse: Xhobani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukumisa nibuchase ubuqhinga boMtyholi.

12.verse: Ngokuba umzamo wethu asingowokuzamana negazi nenyama;  ngowokuzamana nazo izilawuli, nawo amagunya, nazo iziphatha-hlabathi zobumnyama balo eli phakade, nayo imikhosi yomoya abakhohlakeleyo kwezasezulwini iindawo.

13.verse: Ngenxa yoko, qubulani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo; ukuze nibe nako ukuchasa ngomhla ombi, nithi nikufezile konke, nime nimi.

14.verse: Misani ke ngoko, nibhinqe inyaniso esinqeni senu, ninxibe isigcina-sifuba sobulungisa,

15.verse: nibophe ezinyaweni zenu ulungiselelo lweendaba ezilungileyo zoxolo.

16.verse: Ngaphezu kwezo zinto zonke, qubulani ikhaka lokholo, lona nothi ngalo nibe nako ukuzicima zonke iintolo ezinomlilo zakhe ongendawo.

17.verse: Yamkelani isigcina-ntloko sosindiso, nalo ikrele loMoya,  elililizwi likaThixo;

18.verse: ngako konke ukuthandaza nokukhunga, nithandaza amaxesha onke nikuye uMoya; niyiphaphamele loo nto ngako konke ukuzingisa nokukhunga, ngenxa yabo bonke abangcwele;

19.verse: nangenxa yam, ukuba ndiphiwe ilizwi ekuwuvuleni umlomo wam,  ndize ndazise ngokungafihlisiyo imfihlelo yeendaba ezi zilungileyo,

20.verse: ekungenxa yazo endisisigidimi esisezintanjeni; ukuze ndingafihlisi ukuthetha kuzo, njengoko ndimelwe kukuthetha ngako.

21.verse: Ke kaloku, ukuze nani nikwazi okukokwam, ukuba ndinjani na,  wonazisa konke uTikiko, umzalwana oyintanda, umlungiseleli othembekileyo ngokwaseNkosini;

22.verse: endimthume le nto kuni, ukuze nizazi iindaba zethu, nokuze azithuthuzele iintliziyo zenu.

23.verse: Makube luxolo kubo abazalwana, nothando, ndawonye nokholo oluvela kuThixo uYise, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.

24.verse: Ubabalo malube nabo bonke abayithandayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu ngokungenakonakala. Amen.
